title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama LLM, embed and chat integrations to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and convenient slash commands for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completions powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and model auto-pull.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama supporting sync/async calls, streaming, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Lightweight Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails and scripting.

title: ollama-chat-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Postgres, Weaviate, etc.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embedding APIs; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that threads replies using local Ollama models; deploy to Fly.io in one click.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for summarizing notes, generating text and Q&A via Ollama without leaving the vault.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated list of open datasets pre-formatted for fine-tuning models that can be imported into Ollama.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate-limiting, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async client for Ollama’s REST API with serde models.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, mods, benchmarks, and troubleshooting around Ollama.
